attributes.action: TO BRING BACK THE DEATH PENALTY FOR ALL CONVICTED PEADOPHILES,RAPISTS AND CHILD KILLERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ANY PEADOPHILES,RAPISTS OR CHILD KILLERS THAT ARE CONVICTED BY A COURT OF LAW FOR SEXUALY ABUSING,RAPING OR KILLING A CHILD,TENNAGER,WOMEN OR MAN, SHOULD RECIEVE THE DEATH SENTANCE.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
